Issues.Title: Network build failures in 'official/$(reponame)/refs/heads/master' - '20190308.2'
Issues.Body:
@dotnet-mc-bot commented on [Fri Mar 08 2019](https://github.com/dotnet/core-eng/issues/5439)

There were a set of failures during this build. Here is a summary of these:
* https://dnceng.visualstudio.com/internal/_build/results?buildId=118626
  - **Agent:** a000013
  - **Error log:** C:\Users\vsagent\.nuget\packages\microsoft.dotnet.helix.sdk\2.0.0-beta.19156.20\tools\Microsoft.DotNet.Helix.Sdk.MonoQueue.targets(0,0): error : Creator is forbidden when using authenticated access. [F:\vsagent\3\s\eng\common\heli...

@robertborr


---

@robertborr commented on [Fri Mar 08 2019](https://github.com/dotnet/core-eng/issues/5439#issuecomment-471043121)

Build FAILED.

C:\Users\vsagent\.nuget\packages\microsoft.dotnet.helix.sdk\2.0.0-beta.19156.20\tools\Microsoft.DotNet.Helix.Sdk.MonoQueue.targets(51,5): error : Creator is forbidden when using authenticated access. [F:\vsagent\3\s\eng\common\helixpublish.proj]
    0 Warning(s)
    1 Error(s)


---

@robertborr commented on [Fri Mar 08 2019](https://github.com/dotnet/core-eng/issues/5439#issuecomment-471044119)

this is a source code error, that was reverted in the next build
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Network build failures in 'official/$(reponame)/refs/heads/master' - '20190308.2'" (#551)

Issues.Title: Windows Forms - Core fail w/VS19 RC1 and Core 3 preview 3
Issues.Body:
_From @jchang6 on March 8, 2019 14:27_

After installing VS2019 RC1 and .NET Core 3.0 preview 3, my previous Windows Forms apps no longer open. In creating a new project, Windows Forms App (.NET Core) is one of the options, but fails to create. Message: No template could be found with the group identity 'Microsoft.Common.Winforms'
Also, in project properties: Target framework, .NET Core 3.0 is not an option

_Copied from original issue: dotnet/corefx#35893_
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Windows Forms - Core fail w/VS19 RC1 and Core 3 preview 3" (#549)
